shellshocker

Class Ragnar

  • java.lang.Object
    • shellshocker.Ragnar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Location

    public class Ragnar
extends java.lang.Object
implements Location
    User-controlled character that has changing attributes. Attributes include location, speed, direction, and information regarding quantities of weapons, health, shield, and bombs.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ragnar()
      Default constructor for the class. Takes in the images of the user-controlled character and sets positional and speed values.

      • canMoveLeft

        public boolean canMoveLeft(java.util.ArrayList<Boundary> boundList,
                  java.util.ArrayList<EnemySprite> enemyList,
                  java.util.ArrayList<Reactor> reactorList)
        Checks to find whether or not the main character can move to the left. Potential objects that inhibit movement include walls, platforms, doors, and enemies.
        Returns:
        true or false-based on whether the character's movement to the left is blocked or not.
